channel.title: FLM Television Network
channel.description: FLM Television Network - Las Vegas's First Multicultural Television Network. Stream the best in international entertainment, movies, TV shows, and live programming 24/7 on Channel 26.5.

item.title: FLM Channel 26.5 Las Vegas - LIVE
item.description: Watch FLM Television Network live 24/7. Broadcasting from Las Vegas, Nevada on Channel 26.5. Featuring multicultural programming, international entertainment, movies, music, and community content.
